# Product List Template

## Overview
The product list template provides a comprehensive view of products in the admin dashboard.

## Features
- Total product count display
- Pagination information
- Filtered status indicator
- Responsive design

### Template Variables
- `paginator.count`: Total number of products
- `page_obj.start_index`: First item index on current page
- `page_obj.end_index`: Last item index on current page
- `page_obj.number`: Current page number
- `paginator.num_pages`: Total number of pages

## Filtering
Products can be filtered using the search input, which dynamically updates:
- Product count
- Displayed results
- Pagination information

### Filtered Status
When filters are applied, a `(filtered)` indicator is shown next to the total product count.
